roomlist.name: Bottom of Driveway
roomlist.description: You are standing at the bottom of a driveway. There is a mid-sized ranch house to the north with a large front yard with some trees and bushes.

roomlist.name: Top of Driveway
roomlist.description: You are now directly in front of the house. The driveway is full of cracks and the house looks abandoned. There is a path to the backyard to the north, as well as a mailbox next to the front door. A basketball hoop is mounted on the house.

roomlist.name: Street in Front of House
roomlist.description: You are standing in the middle of the street. A white house is to the north. Forest lines the south side of the street as far as you can see.

roomlist.name: The Forest
roomlist.description: The trees around you are tall and thick. The ground is covered in fallen leaves and branches. It is quiet here.

items.name: house
items.description: The house has brick walls with white sidings. The plants are thriving and the windows clean, but there is no sign of anyone living here.
It is round and orange with bumps all over.
items.description_for_room: A basketball sits dejectedly on the side of the driveway.

items.name: house
items.description: Even up close, the house looks pristine.

help: Welcome to House Explorer! This game is a work in progress. Try these commands to interact with your environment:
look                   Show the description of the current location.
look at <thing>        Show the description of the <thing>.
inventory              List the items in your inventory.
take <item>            Add an item to your inventory.
drop <item>            Remove an item from your inventory.
